Summary: Triangular shape object cruising approx 10 miles per hour over ball fields
divs: sighting detailswas sitting in my car after my baseball game and starting watching other games in process. my sunroof was open and i was just relaxing. i felt this presence and looked up. what i noticed was a triangular dark shaped object slowly cruisng the sky approx. 10 miles per hour over the ball fields. maybe a 1\2 mile or so up, the size is hard to determine, but guessing about 30 or 50 feet long at longest width span 30 feet or so. as it crusied in a straight line it seemed to be showing off ( as if telling me watch this ) as it made an unbelievable manuever an l shape turn without stopping or slowing down. as if you were to grab a pencil and draw a vertical line and the end, draw a horizontal line. an impossible manuever you cant even make with a hand motion. within minutes i heard this helicopter come within range, it seemed military but couldn't spot it. the ufo disappeared and so did the helicopter, the incident lasted about 3 or 4 minutes. another incident occurred when i was driving down a main street in my town. off to the left of my peripheral vision i noticed the stadium lights had just come on ( aboiut 4 or 5 blocks away ). as i went forth, an orange glow came beaming down from the sky towards the stadium lights, it suddenly came to a halt, then shot back. an impressive sight but one that makes you ponder what the hell they want ? my theory - they couldn't determine the source quick enough and came down to investigate ? the enourmous surge of energy tricked them and maybe blinded their sensors momentarily ( which means they are fallible )and they hurried down for some reason ? or they are monitoring our planet for invasion ? is it for protection or malicious purpose ? the key question is why does our government keep us blind, with the people all infomred, we could learn so much more. what devious deceiving ideology do they possess that makes them lie to us ?
